```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
read.csv("C:\\Users\\jacob\\Desktop\\data_prime.csv") -> df
```


```{r, message=FALSE}
mean(df$obesity) -> mObesity
mean(df$fruit) -> mFruit
mean(df$veg) -> mVeg

newCol <- c(1:918) 
df <- cbind(df, obesity2 = newCol)
for (i in seq_along(df$obesity2)) {
  df$obesity2[i] = df$obesity[i] - mObesity
}

newCol <- c(1:918) 
df <- cbind(df, fruit2 = newCol)
for (i in seq_along(df$fruit2)) {
  df$fruit2[i] = df$fruit[i] - mFruit
}

newCol <- c(1:918) 
df <- cbind(df, veg2 = newCol)
for (i in seq_along(df$veg2)) {
  df$veg2[i] = df$veg[i] - mVeg
}
```
